background_description: The background consists of rough tree bark heavily covered with patches of green moss and some thin, dark green vines with small, flat leaves. The bark itself is mottled brown and grey, providing a textured and varied surface.
camouflage_type: Color blending / Pattern matching / Shape disruption / Mimicry
explanation: The gecko exhibits exceptional camouflage, blending almost perfectly with its environment. Its coloration, a complex mosaic of browns, greys, and muted greens, precisely matches the lichen and moss-covered tree bark. The texture of its skin, with its rough and bumpy surface, mimics the unevenness of the bark and moss. Furthermore, its unique body shape, especially its flattened profile and irregular, leaf-like edges, effectively disrupts its silhouette, making it nearly indistinguishable from the surrounding textured bark and plant matter. The patterns on its skin also match the irregular patches and textures of the background. This combination of color blending, pattern matching, and shape disruption/mimicry makes it incredibly difficult to spot, leading to a very high camouflage score.
